name: 水月流夏 Memories in the Late Summer

description:
Brief introduction:
The summer is coming to an end, and the autumn steps are slowly approaching this slightly special season.

Lost the memory of the summer youth - hope.

What is the origin of the mystery?

While looking for memories, it seems to be in a more dense affair.
What is the outcome of waiting for such a two person?

In the summer, BL / BG tells the story of youth memory, friendship and love between teenagers and girls in the background of Japanese campus.

During a summer semester - summer vacation game time, the protagonists and fighters are actively training for the preliminaries and eventually heading for the national competition.
